import*as actionTypes from'./ActionType';// Delete Menu Item Actions
export var deleteMenuItemRequest=function deleteMenuItemRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_MENU_ITEM_REQUEST};};export var deleteMenuItemSuccess=function deleteMenuItemSuccess(menuItemId){return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_MENU_ITEM_SUCCESS,payload:menuItemId};};export var deleteMenuItemFailure=function deleteMenuItemFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_MENU_ITEM_FAILURE,payload:error};};// Get Menu Items by Restaurant ID Actions
export var getMenuItemsByRestaurantIdRequest=function getMenuItemsByRestaurantIdRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.GET_MENU_ITEMS_BY_RESTAURANT_ID_REQUEST};};export var getMenuItemsByRestaurantIdSuccess=function getMenuItemsByRestaurantIdSuccess(menuItems){return{type:actionTypes.GET_MENU_ITEMS_BY_RESTAURANT_ID_SUCCESS,payload:menuItems};};export var getMenuItemsByRestaurantIdFailure=function getMenuItemsByRestaurantIdFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.GET_MENU_ITEMS_BY_RESTAURANT_ID_FAILURE,payload:error};};// Create Menu Item Actions
export var createMenuItemRequest=function createMenuItemRequest(){return{type:actionTypes.CREATE_MENU_ITEM_REQUEST};};export var createMenuItemSuccess=function createMenuItemSuccess(menuItem){return{type:actionTypes.CREATE_MENU_ITEM_SUCCESS,payload:menuItem};};export var createMenuItemFailure=function createMenuItemFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.CREATE_MENU_ITEM_FAILURE,payload:error};};
